defaults.pricingdisclaimer: *Pricing disclaimer: All prices quoted are computer generated estimates. Final Quote will depend on availability of aircraft,actual flying time and type of aircraft used. Additional charges such as parking, hangar, facility use fees, customs, deicing, international operations charges, handling fees, flight phone use, catering, etc. are billed as incurred. After reviewing your trip requirements, an Airnetz Charter Inc. specialist will contact you to discuss the details of your trip. All flights are operated by non schedule operators certified under Federal Aviation Regulations Part 135 or Part 121 as issued by the Federal Aviation Administration.
